item.title: Trisha's 'Son' Zorro Passes Away On Christmas, Shares Heartbreaking Note: 'I Am Broken, In Shock' - News18
item.description:
Trisha's 'Son' Zorro Passes Away On Christmas, Shares Heartbreaking Note: 'I Am Broken, In Shock'

Date: December 25, 2024   Source: News18

Tamil actress Trisha shared heartbreaking news on Christmas that her pet dog Zorro has passed away. She expressed her shock and sorrow, stating that she needs time off to grieve.

  • Trisha's pet dog Zorro passed away early on Christmas morning.
  • She shared an emotional note highlighting her loss and need for time away from work.
  • Fans flooded the comments section with condolences and support for the actress.
  • Zorro was a part of Trisha's life for over a decade and frequently appeared on her social media.
  • Trisha has several upcoming film projects lined up for future releases.
“My son Zorro passed away early this Christmas morning. For those who know me well know that my life has zero meaning henceforth. My family and I are broken and in a state of shock. Will be taking some time off work and will be off the radar.” - Trisha

The loss of Zorro marks a significant emotional moment for Trisha, who has shared a deep bond with her pet over the years.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' stampede: Producer Dil Raju says 'entire film industry' will meet Telangana CM on Thursday - The Times of India
item.description:
Pushpa 2' stampede: Producer Dil Raju says 'entire film industry' will meet Telangana CM on Thursday

Date: [Publication Date] | Source: Times of India

The unfortunate stampede incident at a screening of 'Pushpa 2' has sparked widespread concern, prompting the film industry to take action.

  • Producer Dil Raju expressed that the entire film industry will be meeting with the Chief Minister of Telangana.
  • The meeting aims to discuss the repercussions of the stampede and ensure the safety of attendees at future screenings.
  • Emergency protocols and safety measures are expected to be reviewed during this meeting.
“The safety of our viewers is our foremost priority,” said Dil Raju.

This tragic event has highlighted the need for improved crowd management at film events, as the industry takes steps to safeguard its audience.

item.title: Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College: 'When She Became A Teenager.. - News18
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College

Date: December 25, 2024, Source: News18

Varun Dhawan reminisces about his childhood friendship with Shraddha Kapoor, including her childhood crush on him and his eventual regret for rejecting her.

  • Varun rejected Shraddha's crush at age eight, leading to a playful confrontation.
  • Years later, Varun saw Shraddha at a school event and was struck by her beauty.
  • The two have starred together in films like ABCD 2 and Street Dancer 3D.
“When Shraddha became a teenager, she had become extremely beautiful.” - Varun Dhawan

This nostalgic recollection highlights the playful nature of childhood relationships and their evolution over time.

item.title: Raha changes into red for a family photo with Alia-Ranbir; fans miss Kareena, Suhana at Kapoors’ annual Christmas - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Raha Kapoor Steals the Show at the Kapoors' Annual Christmas Gathering

Published on: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor's daughter Raha Kapoor delighted fans this Christmas as she interacted with paparazzi during the Kapoors’ annual family brunch, resulting in viral moments on social media.

  • Raha Kapoor, the daughter of Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor, was introduced to the public last Christmas.
  • This year, she made headlines by waving and blowing kisses to paparazzi.
  • Alia wore a stunning red satin dress, while Ranbir was stylish in a blue and white striped shirt.
  • Raha charmed everyone in a festive red checkered outfit.
  • Notable absentees from the family photo included Kareena Kapoor Khan and Suhana Khan, which fans expressed disappointment over.
“According to Kareena’s insta posts she’s in the UK with Saifu & the kids, so I guess she won’t be there for Christmas this year either,” commented a fan.

The Kapoor family continues to captivate fans with their charming gatherings, despite the absence of some familiar faces this year.

item.title: Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Baby John Opening Day Box Office Trends: Varun Dhawan starrer aims at a Rs 12 crore start

Published on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Varun Dhawan led action entertainer, Baby John, has taken a promising start at the Indian box office, with early trends indicating a first-day business of Rs 11 crore to Rs 12 crore.

  • The film's performance benefited from the Christmas holiday but faced competition from other releases like Pushpa 2 and Mufasa.
  • It is suggested that without competition, Baby John could have opened in the range of Rs 13 crore to Rs 15 crore.
  • Despite the challenges, this is the best opening for Varun Dhawan among recent non-franchise films, barring 83 directed by Kabir Khan.
  • The holiday period ahead offers opportunities for Baby John to potentially achieve Rs 100 crore by the end of its run.
  • The first day's drop and subsequent hold in business on Day 2 and Day 3 will be crucial in determining its long-term trajectory.
“It’s a decent start for Baby John, but the trend over the next few days is crucial.”

In conclusion, while Baby John shows promise, its success will depend on audience turnout in the coming days amid ongoing competition.

item.title: MEGA EXCLUSIVE: Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar join hands for Rs. 150 crore action love story; Sameer Vidhwans to direct - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar Collaborate on Ambitious Rs. 150 Crore Action Love Story

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Kartik Aaryan and Karan Johar are set to collaborate on their first film together, an action-packed love story directed by Sameer Vidhwans, known for Satyaprem Ki Katha.

  • The project has been in discussion for a long time and is now officially in place.
  • The film has a budget of Rs. 150 crores and is described as one of the most ambitious love stories of modern times.
  • Kartik Aaryan is enthusiastic about returning to the big screen after his role in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3.
  • The film will be co-produced by Dharma Productions and Namah Pictures, with an announcement expected within two days.
"It's an ambitious film to be made on a budget of Rs. 150 crores, and the entire team is very excited to bring the film to the audience in 2026."

This collaboration could have significant implications for both Aaryan's and Johar's careers, merging their fanbases and setting high expectations for the film's success.

item.title: Barroz movie review: Mohanlal’s passion project ends up as a lost opportunity - The Hindu
item.description:
Barroz Movie Review: Mohanlal's Passion Project Ends Up as a Lost Opportunity

Published Date: December 25, 2024 Source: The Hindu

Mohanlal’s dream project, Barroz, directed by him, has turned out to be a disappointing fantasy drama that fails to engage its audience deeply. Despite its ambitious premise, the film's unimaginative screenplay and overdramatic dialogues leave it feeling underdeveloped.

  • The film is based on a children’s story about a ghost guarding a treasure linked to Portuguese rule in India.
  • Barroz’s screenplay was significantly altered early in production, leading to a lack of coherence.
  • Visual effects and 3D sequences, while decent, do not suffice to mask the film's deeper storytelling issues.
  • Critics note that the film lacks the charm and engagement expected from a children's film.
“Barroz ended up as a lost opportunity.”

In conclusion, Barroz carries the weight of a well-known star and significant ambition, but ultimately fails to deliver a captivating or emotionally resonant experience.

item.title: Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun, Pushpa 2 makers announce ₹2 crore aid to Sandhya Theatre stampede victim's family

Date: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

This article discusses the financial support announced by Allu Aravind and others for the family of an eight-year-old boy injured in the tragic Sandhya Theatre stampede that occurred during a screening of Pushpa 2.

  • Allu Aravind announced ₹2 crores to support the family of the injured boy.
  • The boy's mother was killed in the stampede, which happened on December 4.
  • Allu Arjun is currently facing investigation regarding his involvement in the incident.
  • The boy is recovering and has been taken off ventilator support, according to his father.
“The boy, Sri Teja, is recovering. Now he is not on a ventilator. To support the family, we should support him with ₹2 crore.” - Allu Aravind

Despite the ongoing investigation, the support from the film industry highlights the community's response to a tragic incident, focusing on aiding the affected family during a difficult time.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 20: Less Than 10 Crores Away From Becoming Third Indian Film In History To Achieve This Feat! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 20: Less Than 10 Crores Away From Becoming Third Indian Film In History To Achieve This Feat

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2, featuring Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil, continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, rapidly approaching a significant milestone in Indian cinema.

Key Points:

  • On its third Tuesday, the film earned 15 crores net in the domestic market.
  • After 21 days, the domestic box office total stands at 1109 crores.
  • The film is now the highest-grossing Indian film.
  • Worldwide gross earnings after 21 days total 1590.27 crores, just less than 10 crores away from crossing 1600 crores.
  • Previous records for Indian films at this level include Dangal and Baahubali 2.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

Pushpa 2 is already the highest-grossing Indian film.

Note: Box office numbers are based on estimates and have not been independently verified.

Conclusion:

As it stands, Pushpa 2 is on track to set new benchmarks in the Indian film industry, continuing to attract audiences even amidst strong competition.

item.title: Raha Kapoor gives flying kisses, says hello to the paps and melts the internet as she arrives with parent - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Raha Kapoor Melts Hearts Arriving for Christmas Lunch with Parents Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt

Publication Date: December 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

This Christmas, the Kapoor family gathered for their traditional lunch, where Raha Kapoor charmed everyone with her adorable greetings to the paparazzi.

  • Raha was seen saying hello and waving at the paparazzi, which made Alia Bhatt laugh heartily.
  • Ranbir Kapoor playfully carried Raha and asked if she wanted to stand outside the car.
  • Alia requested the photographers to be gentle around Raha, noting that she gets scared.
  • Alia was dressed in a stunning red dress while Raha wore a lovely white frock.
  • Ranbir was pictured looking stylish with a moustache, embodying his 'Love And War' character.
  • Both Ranbir and Alia are working on upcoming films, with Ranbir also involved in the project 'Ramayana' set to start next year.
“Thoda dheere, usko darr lagta hai (Be soft, she gets scared),” Alia Bhatt told the paparazzi.

The affectionate moment shared by the Kapoor family reflects their deep bond, charming fans during the festive season.

item.title: Amazon Prime Video Takes Down Ajay Devgn’s Singham Again In A Shocking Move! - Koimoi
item.description:
Amazon Prime Video Takes Down Ajay Devgn’s Singham Again In A Shocking Move!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Ajay Devgn’s 'Singham Again' made a successful box office debut but has now been unexpectedly removed from Amazon Prime Video’s catalog, leaving fans and media perplexed.

  • Despite receiving mixed reviews, 'Singham Again' became a commercial success, grossing ₹247.85 crore in India.
  • The film was initially listed for an OTT release on Amazon Prime but was removed without explanation.
  • This decision has sparked speculation about the future of the 'Singham' franchise, with hints at another sequel involving Salman Khan.
This unexpected development has surprised many, as Amazon Prime Video has provided no official clarification.

The removal of 'Singham Again' from Prime Video raises questions about the film's future availability and the decisions surrounding it.

item.title: Raha melts hearts with sweet ‘hi’ and flying kiss while posing with Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt at Kapoor family Christmas lunch. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Raha melts hearts with sweet ‘hi’ and flying kiss while posing with Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt at Kapoor family Christmas lunch. Watch

Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

The Kapoor family held their annual Christmas lunch, where Raha Kapoor charmed onlookers by greeting photographers with a sweet “hi” before blowing a flying kiss.

  • Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and their daughter Raha were present at the festive event.
  • Alia Bhatt asked photographers to be gentle to ensure Raha wasn't scared.
  • Raha’s adorable outfit and behavior melted hearts, continuing the family tradition of inviting media attention.
  • This occasion holds special significance, as Raha was introduced to the public for the first time last Christmas.
Alia Bhatt on revealing Raha's face: “I just didn’t want to be like a whole thing... such a cute moment where she was holding both our faces like that.”

This heartwarming moment exemplifies the Kapoor family’s blend of privacy and public life as they share their special moments with fans.

item.title: Sonu Nigam on his tribute concert on Mohammed Rafi's 100th birth anniversary: Rafi sahab, thank you for being by my side - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sonu Nigam's Tribute Concert Celebrates Mohammed Rafi's Centenary

Date: December 25, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Sonu Nigam held an emotional tribute concert on December 24 in Mumbai to honor the legendary singer Mohammed Rafi on his 100th birth anniversary, performing 54 songs with a 50-member symphony orchestra.

  • The concert featured classics like "Yeh Chand Sa Roshan Chehra" and "Aaja Aaja Main Hoon Pyaar Tera".
  • Attended by Rafi's family, the event was a heartfelt tribute from Sonu to his musical idol.
  • Sonu expressed gratitude for the opportunity to honor Rafi sahab, stating, "Main aaj jo bhi hoon unki wajah se hoon.".
  • The concert was organized by NR Talent and Event Management.
“Seeing it take shape so beautifully, with audiences smiling and swaying along, made our hearts so full.” - Rabbani Mustafa Khan

The event concluded with a rendition of the song "Sau Saal Pehle" and a collective birthday wish for Rafi sahab.

item.title: Suriya and Karthik Subbaraj’s film is titled Retro; Title teaser looks splendid - 123telugu
item.description:
Suriya and Karthik Subbaraj’s film is titled Retro; Title teaser looks splendid

Published on: Dec 25, 2024 3:00 pm IST

Actor Suriya is set to make a comeback with Karthik Subbaraj's film, Retro, which blends romance and action. The film's title teaser, released on Christmas, hints at a dramatic storyline and promises a refreshing role for Suriya amidst a backdrop of challenges.

  • The film is titled Retro, with a teaser exceeding two minutes.
  • Suriya's previous film Kanguva faced significant criticism, and this project raises hopes for his comeback.
  • The storyline explores themes of love, sacrifice, and the underworld.
  • Pooja Hegde plays the female lead, expected to have a strong role impacting the narrative.
  • The film is produced by Jyotika and Suriya under 2D Entertainment, set for release in Summer 2025.
“Suriya realizes that love is the very purpose of his life,” showcasing depth in character development.

Overall, Retro aims to deliver a compelling story with strong production values, promising a significant cinematic experience for audiences.

item.title: Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India, Cast, What To Expect And All About K-drama Before Premiere - News24
item.description:
Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India

Date & Source: December 25, 2024, by Simran Srivastava

The Korean thriller web series ‘Squid Game’ is set to premiere its much-anticipated second season, with fans eagerly awaiting its release. This article provides essential details about the upcoming season.

Release Date And Time In India

‘Squid Game Season 2’ will be available on Netflix on December 26 at around 12:30 PM in India.

Total Episodes

Unlike the first season, Season 2 will consist of seven episodes.

Cast

Returning cast members include Lee Jung-jae, Lee Byung-hun, Wi Ha-jun, and Gong Yoo. New entries to the cast are Yim Si-wan, Kang Ha-neul, Park Gyu-young, and others.

About Season 3

Director Hwang Dong-hyuk has announced plans for a third season, promising more thrilling developments in the story.

Plot Continuation

Season 2 will pick up from the cliffhanger of Season 1, with Gi-hun choosing to stay in South Korea and return to the deadly game.

“I am thrilled to see the seed that was planted in creating a new Squid Game grow and bear fruit through the end of this story.” - Hwang Dong-hyuk

item.title: Keerthy Suresh looks shocked as her team argues with paparazzo for objectionable pics: ‘Aise ajeeb kaise…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh reacts to team confrontation with paparazzo over objectionable photos

Date: Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

During the premiere of her Hindi debut film Baby John, actress Keerthy Suresh experienced an unexpected confrontation between her team and a paparazzo, leading to a moment of concern for portrayal.

  • Keerthy attended the premiere in Mumbai just a day before the film's release.
  • Her team confronted a paparazzo, accusing him of taking objectionable photos as she was getting into a car.
  • The paparazzo claimed it was a misunderstanding, although emotions ran high during the incident.
  • Keerthy appeared shocked and concerned about the situation and her outfit.
  • The incident highlights the challenges celebrities face with paparazzi during public appearances.
“Aise kyu le rahe ho? She is getting in, no? Aise ajeeb kaise le rahe ho?” - Keerthy Suresh’s team member.

This incident underscores the delicate balance between celebrity privacy and media attention, sparking conversations about the responsibilities of paparazzi when capturing images of public figures.

item.title: Marco Box Office Collection Day 5: Unni Mukundan Starrer Surpasses Lifetime Collection Of 1st Malayalam Hit Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Marco Box Office Collection Day 5: Unni Mukundan Starrer Surpasses Lifetime Collection Of 1st Malayalam Hit

Date: December 24, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Malayalam Cinema is all set to deliver another hit film as it wraps up the year 2024. Unni Mukundan’s Marco is running well in the theaters, and in five days, it has earned a total of 27.73 crore, maintaining the pace over the week.

  • On day 5, Marco earned 2.43 crore.
  • It has surpassed the total lifetime collection of the first Malayalam hit of 2024, 21 crore.
  • The film has reportedly mounted on a budget of 30 crore and has earned 21.55 crore in five days.
“With 21.55 crore collection, Marco has surpassed the total lifetime collection of the first Malayalam hit of 2024.”

In conclusion, Marco is set to continue its success at the box office, with a promising trajectory towards entering the profit zone.

item.title: Your Christmas just got hotter: 5 raunchy Christmas movies to stream this holiday season! - Hindustan Times
item.description:
5 Raunchy Christmas Movies to Stream This Holiday Season

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

This holiday season, spice up your movie-watching experience with five raunchy Christmas films that add a deliciously naughty twist to the festivities.

  • Hot Frosty: A lonely widow brings a handsome snowman to life, leading to unexpected romance.
  • The Merry Gentlemen: A big-city dancer aims to save her family’s theatre with a shirtless, Christmas-themed revue.
  • Our Little Secret: A woman navigates family drama when she encounters her ex during Christmas.
  • ‘Twas the Text Before Christmas: A spontaneous trip leads to unexpected friendships and a potential romance.
  • A Paris Christmas Waltz: An accountant and retired dancer find chemistry while competing in a Christmas dance competition.
“Grab your cosy blanket, a box of chocolates, and settle in for a Christmas binge.”

These films promise to bring excitement and laughter to your holiday celebrations, making for a memorable and entertaining viewing experience.

item.title: Malaika Arora finally REACTS to Arjun Kapoor’s ‘I’m single’ comment: ‘I will never choose…’ - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Malaika Arora Responds to Arjun Kapoor's 'I'm Single' Comment

Updated on Dec 25, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Malaika Arora has addressed Arjun Kapoor's recent remark about being single, emphasizing her wish to keep her personal life private.

  • Malaika feels it's unnecessary to discuss personal matters publicly.
  • Arjun confirmed he is single during a public event.
  • Malaika stated, "I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life."
  • She encouraged moving on and welcoming the new year positively.
  • Previously, Malaika playfully engaged with her relationship status on Instagram.
"I will never choose a public platform to talk about my personal life. So, whatever Arjun has said is entirely his prerogative."

This response highlights her preference for privacy amidst public scrutiny after their breakup.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's career is ‘dead’ as Blake Lively's filing is ‘just the start’ of legal war: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Blake Lively Accuses Justin Baldoni of Sexual Harassment: A Legal Battle Begins

Publication Date: December 25, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has filed a civil rights complaint against her co-star Justin Baldoni, accusing him of sexual harassment during the filming of 'It Ends With Us'. The legal actions mark the beginning of a significant legal feud, impacting Baldoni's career as allegations of a smear campaign arise.

  • Blake Lively files a complaint alleging sexual harassment against Justin Baldoni.
  • The complaint includes accusations of a retaliatory smear campaign orchestrated by Baldoni's PR firm.
  • Baldoni's career has taken a hit; he has lost representation from talent agency WME.
  • Legal expert predicts Lively could potentially win millions from the lawsuit.
  • The situation draws parallels to the Johnny Depp-Amber Heard legal battles.
  • Baldoni’s reputation is severely impacted, with increasing support for Lively from the film industry.
“It's absolutely reputation-related. She has, between her and her husband, all the money in the world.” - Attorney Camron Dowlatshahi

This case highlights serious allegations in the entertainment industry, with significant reputational implications and a potential long-lasting impact on Baldoni's career.

item.title: Christmas 2024: From Rupali Ganguly to Arjun Bijlani-Neha Swami; celebs give a peek into their celebrations - The Times of India
item.description:
Christmas 2024: From Rupali Ganguly to Arjun Bijlani-Neha Swami; celebs give a peek into their celebrations

Date: December 25, 2024 Source: Times of India

This Christmas, stars like Rupali Ganguly, Arjun Bijlani, and Neha Swami opened their doors to fans, offering a glimpse into their festive celebrations. From cozy family moments to vibrant decorations and heartfelt traditions, these celebrities embraced the spirit of the season with love, joy, and togetherness.

  • Rupali Ganguly posed in a white saree by a beautifully decorated tree, sharing her festive joy.
  • Arjun Bijlani celebrated with his family, spreading warmth through cheerful pictures.
  • Shrenu Parikh integrated her Christmas festivities with her family milestones.
  • Karishma Tanna emphasized love and gratitude in her heartfelt Christmas message.
  • Priyanka Chahar Choudhary joined a star-studded Christmas celebration alongside many other celebrities.
“Merry Christmas 2024 !! Stay blessed everyone,” - Arjun Bijlani

The article showcases how celebrities adapt their celebrations to share joy and togetherness, making the Christmas spirit come alive within their extravagant lifestyles.
